title: Wait for a Summer - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Love   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Unconditional Love   Younger Love Interests
author: Ruò Míng Yì   若明翼
description:
[You walk all the way, I look up all the way.

How many summers should I wait to let you know I love you. ]

In the last youth of life, talk about the most unripe romance.

The local taste of love between an older woman and a younger man, sensitive neighbor older sister VS Mensao neighbor younger brother.>
